status: draft

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Yellow Fever vaccine between age 9-12 months

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT12

action

title: Immunize Patient for Yellow Fever - No Doses

description: Provide Yellow Fever immunizations – using the "Yellow Fever vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression

condition

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country has Yellow Fever Endemic" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Yellow Fever because no doses on 1 dose scheme
